projects.title: Pro-Card Philippines
projects.description: Pro-Card is a discount card program that lets you enjoy rebates on diverse list of establishments, be insured in a realistic insurance plan, and avail a handful of other benefits.

projects.title: Faculty Evaluation and Student Grading System
projects.description: A web-based faculty evaluation and student grading system. Includes features like evaluation schedules, scores; grading criteria for college and senior high school; as well as general school admin functions

projects.title: Simple CMS
projects.description: Content management system based from Modern Business HTML template. Powered by Object-Oriented PHP. You can create blog posts, portfolio items, slider images, categories, etc
